meaning_str.bing:
v. 打；打击；击中；命中
n. 打；击中；命中；很受欢迎的人（或事物）
网络. 碰撞；命中率

打；击中；命中；很受欢迎的人（或事物）

打；击中；击打；撞击；攻击；冲击；按；访问（网站）；（灾难、疾病等）侵袭；袭击；（尤指商业或娱乐产品）大受欢迎；走红；（尤指毒品）产生效果；产生不良影响；（尤指在感情上）伤害；使痛苦；使突然想起
击中；命中；打；热门歌曲；流行音乐唱片；热门影视作品；很受欢迎的人（或者物）；撞击声；（体育运动中的）有效打击

1.en: Unfortunately, or fortunately, the fact of the matter was he respected people who actually bit him and hit him.
1.cn: 很不幸，拟或是很幸运的事实是，他尊重曾经咬过他、打过他的人。

2.en: The game was opening up. Rooney powered goal-side of Essien and raced for goal, but Cech claimed it from his feet when he over hit it.
2.cn: 比赛开始激烈起来。鲁尼抢下艾辛的球，长驱直入，但是切赫在他倘大的一瞬从他的脚下把球扑住。

3.en: Kazakhstan was flying high until it was one of the first countries to be hit by the global financial crisis.
3.cn: 在成为首批受全球金融危机冲击的国家之一之前，哈萨克斯坦一直高歌猛进。

0.en: We hit him from all four sides. Hit him hard.
0.cn: 我们从四面发动进攻，狠狠地打。

1.en: You mean so it doesn't hit the fan?
1.cn: 你是说不要打中风扇?[酿成大祸]？

2.en: He has sex, and we get hit in our heads.
2.cn: 他做爱了，我们却要挨打。

3.en: Get out. I couldn't stop if a meteor hit me.
3.cn: 少来了，我就算被陨石打中也停不下来。

4.en: Give me the bag. Give me the bag. No, hit me. hit me. Give me the bag. I'm not kidding. Hit me. No. Hit me. Hit me. Hit me!
4.cn: 把那个袋子给我，把袋子给我 。不，打我，打我。给我袋子，给我袋子。打我。不，打我，打我，打我！

5.en: Justin Bieber got a hit and run, Chris Brown got a hit and run, Rihanna got hit and still didn't run.
5.cn: 贾斯汀·比伯和克里斯·布朗肇事逃逸了，但蕾哈娜被打了却没有跑。

6.en: No, I don't want to hit you. Oh what then? Kick me? No. Bite me?
6.cn: 不，我不想打你。什么？你要踢我？不咬我？

7.en: Hey. Hey. Look, I understand if you came by to hit me, I deserve it.
7.cn: 如果你是来打我的，我了解，这是我活该。

8.en: Okay. What about the time I hit you in the face with Sylvian's pumpkin?
8.cn: 等等，那我用薇恩的南瓜打你脸那一次呢？

9.en: All right, I'm off to talk to my unborn child. Okay, Mom never hit.
9.cn: 我要去和还没出生的宝宝说话了。妈妈从不打我。

10.en: They hit us so hard. It's all right, baseball's our sport anyway.
10.cn: 他们深深地伤害了我。没关系啦，反正我们要打棒球了。

11.en: Yeah? What about that bike messenger you hit? Oh, I wasn't talking about his karma.
11.cn: 被你打的自行车快递员呢？我不是在说他的运气。

12.en: George is going to be the ball boy. He has to collect the ball when it is hit too far.
12.cn: 乔治要来当球童，当球被打到远处时，他要来捡球。

13.en: I'm not gonna hit you. Why not? You'll feel better. I'll feel better. And you know you want to, I can see it in your eyes.
13.cn: 我不会打你的。为什么不？你会比较好过，我也会比较好过。你知道，你想打我，我从你眼中看得出来。

14.en: She screamed. She hit him. Before he could even realize that he was bleeding, she was running, calling for help. But he ran after her. It was pitch black.
14.cn: 她尖叫着打他。当时他还没意识到他在流血，她逃走了，打电话求助。他去追她了。那里漆黑一片。

15.en: Get everybody off their phones. Hey, no phones. Get people off their computers. Don't hit send.
15.cn: 所有人挂掉电话，别打电话，所有人停止使用电脑。别点击发送。

16.en: Mm, it's complicated. But as I remember it, the essentials are get chosen last, get hit by the ball, cry, go home.
16.cn: 规则很复杂的，不过在我看来，棒球的精髓就是最后才被选中，被球打，痛哭，回家。

17.en: No, I don't know what else to do. I said I'm sorry, now. Joey. Now you should scream at me or curse me or hit me.
17.cn: 不，我不知道还能怎样，我已经道歉了，现在，现在你应该对我吼叫、咒骂，或是打我。

18.en: Look. It's simplicity itself. You just turn on the gas, hit the electric starter. Hit the electric starter.
18.cn: 你看，很简单的，打开气阀，点火，点火。

19.en: I'm letting life hit me until it gets tired. And then I'm gonna hit back. It's a classic "Rope-a-dope". Okay, Ali. I love you. Unpack your boxes.
19.cn: 让生活狠狠地打击我，直到它怂了。然后我就反击，这是经典的以逸待劳。行了，阿里，我爱你。快收拾你箱子。
